about_the_game:
Unveiling the Unknown is a visual novel adaptation of mdf-an's fan-dubbed work "Futanari-Sama and Her Maids", where you play the titular 'Futanari-Sama'.

You recently moved into a manor, and it's full of maids ready to cater to your every need with plenty of sexual content! But the maids are also serving your unlikable twin brother... Can you steal his harem from under his nose?

The daily loop consists of choosing to spend your morning getting to know one of the characters in the manor, with frequent sexual fun. During the night, you can go dungeon diving to collect a variety of resources to level the maids and upgrade the manor.

  • 52+ Sex Scenes and 100+ Sex CG with a variety of girls and kinks.
  • 5 Maids, a Nun, and one very sassy Demon Queen to conquer! All the girls have their own unique stories and developments.
  • 11 more ladies waiting to be discovered around the world.
  • Play as a futanari, femboy, intersex or transgender protagonist.
  • 100+ Upgrades for the Turn-Based Dungeon Crawling game.
  • 15+ Hours of Playtime.
  • Easy to replay any sex scene or event, and a comprehensive cheat menu.
  • Art by mdf-an and TwistedScarlett60

Meet the Maids:


Seraphina - The Head Maid:
Diligent and loyal maid to a fault. When asked to perform a sexual service, she would do so without question. She loves service, cock worship and desires nothing more than to have a loving family.

Mirabelle - The Grand Paladin:
Timid and shy maid. She struggles to reach out to others and make friends, but together, you can help her open up. She has taken a vow of chasity, but I have a feeling it won't last long.

Hazel - The Crimson Witch
Brazen and confident, Hazel knows what she wants and how to get it. Odds are, she'll be seducing you, not the other way around.

Emi - The Ninja
The ninja from a faraway land turned maid. She has an obsession with the legendary hero... How can we win her over and cuck the hero?

Ophelia - The Dragoon
The tsundere maid that's hiding more than a few secrets. It might take her a little longer to open up than the others, but you might get more than you bargained for!

Beatrice - The Nun
A new addition to the manor... Just what might happen if you push the buttons of a sexually suppressed celibate?
